metadata.title: Ghost Post - AI-Powered SEO Automation
metadata.description: The first autonomous AI agent that optimizes, writes, and manages your site's SEO while you sleep.

hero.title: Your Website's SEO on
hero.subtitle: The first autonomous AI agent that optimizes, writes, and manages your site's SEO while you sleep. Set it and forget it.

features.subtitle: Powerful features that work together to dominate search rankings

items.title: Autonomous AI Agent
items.description: Ghost works 24/7 analyzing, optimizing, and implementing SEO strategies without human intervention.

items.title: Content Generation
items.description: Automatically creates SEO-optimized content based on keyword research and competitor analysis.

items.title: Real-Time Optimization
items.description: Continuously monitors rankings and adapts strategies to maintain top search positions.

items.title: Smart Automations
items.description: Automate meta tags, internal linking, image optimization, and technical SEO fixes.

items.title: Time Machine Mode
items.description: Set it and forget it. Ghost handles everything from keyword research to content publishing.

items.title: Safe & Compliant
items.description: Follows Google guidelines and best practices to ensure sustainable, penalty-free growth.

features.metaDescription: Explore 100+ automated SEO features powered by AI
features.title: Complete
features.subtitle: Everything you need to dominate search rankings, powered by autonomous AI that works 24/7.
features.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to dominate search rankings, powered by autonomous AI that works 24/7.
features.aiContentDesc: Ghost analyzes your niche, competitors, and top-ranking content to automatically generate SEO-optimized articles, product descriptions, and landing pages that rank.
aiContentBenefits: Natural language processing for human-quality content
Keyword optimization based on search intent
features.keywordResearchDesc: Discover high-value keywords with low competition. Ghost continuously monitors search trends and identifies new opportunities before your competitors do.
features.linkBuildingDesc: Ghost identifies link-building opportunities, reaches out to relevant websites, and secures high-quality backlinks for your site automatically.
features.technicalSeoDesc: Automatically fix technical issues that hurt your rankings. Ghost handles meta tags, sitemaps, robots.txt, structured data, and more.
features.mediaOptimizationDesc: Compress images, generate alt text, and optimize media files for faster loading and better SEO without manual intervention.
features.analyticsDesc: Track your SEO performance with detailed analytics, competitor comparisons, and actionable insights delivered to your inbox.
features.ctaDescription: Start your 14-day free trial and experience the power of AI-driven SEO.

howItWorks.title: How Ghost Post
howItWorks.subtitle: From setup to results, Ghost handles everything automatically
howItWorks.metaDescription: From setup to success in 6 simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Simple one-click integration with your website. Ghost analyzes your current SEO state and identifies opportunities.
howItWorks.step2Description: Ghost deep-scans your site and identifies all available SEO opportunities.
howItWorks.step3Description: Ghost builds a customized SEO strategy for your business based on collected data.
howItWorks.step4Description: Ghost generates SEO-optimized content automatically based on the strategy.
howItWorks.step5Description: Ghost implements changes and technical fixes automatically and safely.
howItWorks.step6Description: Track your rankings improve in real-time. Ghost continues to optimize.
howItWorks.ctaDescription: Connect your website and let Ghost handle your SEO automatically.

steps.title: Connect Your Site
steps.description: Simple one-click integration with your website. Ghost analyzes your current SEO state and identifies opportunities.

steps.title: AI Takes Over
steps.description: Ghost creates a comprehensive SEO strategy, generates optimized content, and implements technical fixes automatically.

steps.title: Watch Growth
steps.description: Monitor your rankings improve in real-time. Ghost continuously optimizes based on performance data.

pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing.starterDescription: Perfect for small businesses and startups
pricing.proDescription: For growing businesses serious about SEO
pricing.enterpriseDescription: For large organizations with complex needs

faqs.question: How does the free trial work?
faqs.answer: Start with a 14-day free trial on any plan. No credit card required. Experience the full power of Ghost Post with all features unlocked.

faqs.question: Can I change plans later?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing.

faqs.question: What happens if I exceed my visitor limit?
faqs.answer: We'll send you a notification when you're approaching 80% of your limit. You can either upgrade or continue with a small overage fee.

faqs.question: Is Ghost Post safe for my website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Ghost follows all Google Webmaster Guidelines and uses only white-hat, approved SEO techniques.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment in full.

cta.title: Ready to Automate Your SEO?
cta.description: Join hundreds of businesses growing their organic traffic with Ghost Post

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize SEO and make it accessible to businesses of all sizes.
about.metaDescription: Learn about our mission to revolutionize SEO with AI
about.storyParagraph1: Ghost Post was founded in 2024 by a team of AI researchers and SEO experts who saw an opportunity to revolutionize how businesses approach search engine optimization.
about.storyParagraph2: We believed that the future of SEO wasn't about manual optimization or hiring expensive agencies—it was about building intelligent systems that could learn, adapt, and execute SEO strategies autonomously.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, Ghost Post powers SEO for hundreds of businesses worldwide, from startups to enterprise companies, helping them achieve sustainable organic growth without the complexity and cost of traditional SEO.
about.value1Description: We're constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI-powered SEO.
about.value2Description: Your success is our success. We're not happy until you're ranking #1.
about.value3Description: We believe in honest, white-hat SEO practices. No tricks, no shortcuts.
about.value4Description: We move fast and deliver results faster than any traditional agency.
about.member1Bio: Former Google engineer with 15 years of experience in search and AI.
about.member2Bio: PhD in Machine Learning from Stanford. Built AI systems at OpenAI.
about.member3Bio: 10+ years building SEO tools at Moz and Ahrefs.
about.member4Bio: Passionate about helping businesses grow through organic search.
about.ctaDescription: Ready to experience the future of SEO? Start your free trial today.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower every business owner to compete in organic search, regardless of their technical expertise or budget.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Ghost Post was founded in 2024 by a team of SEO experts and AI engineers who were frustrated by how complex and expensive SEO had become.
We believed that AI could handle the heavy lifting of SEO while delivering better results than traditional agencies. After two years of development, Ghost Post was born.
Today, we help over 500 businesses automate their SEO and grow their organic traffic. Our AI has generated over 50,000 pieces of content and improved rankings for millions of keywords.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We believe in honest, white-hat SEO practices. No tricks, no shortcuts.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We're constantly improving our AI to deliver better results for our customers.

items.title: Customer Success
items.description: Your success is our success. We're not happy until you're ranking #1.

blog.title: The
blog.subtitle: Insights, tips, and strategies to dominate search rankings
blog.post1Title: The Future of SEO: How AI is Revolutionizing Search
blog.post1Excerpt: Discover how artificial intelligence is transforming the way we approach search engine optimization and what it means for your business.
blog.post2Excerpt: Stay ahead of the competition with these proven SEO strategies that will help you dominate search rankings this year.
blog.post3Excerpt: Master the technical aspects of SEO with our comprehensive guide covering site speed, crawlability, and more.
blog.post4Excerpt: Learn how to create content that ranks, engages, and converts your target audience.
blog.post5Title: Case Study: 300% Traffic Increase in 6 Months
blog.post5Excerpt: See how one e-commerce company tripled their organic traffic using Ghost Post's AI-powered automation.
blog.post6Excerpt: Everything you need to know about Google's Core Web Vitals and how to optimize for them.
blog.post7Title: Keyword Research in the Age of AI
blog.post7Excerpt: Traditional keyword research is evolving. Learn how AI is changing the game and how to adapt.
blog.post8Title: Building a Content Calendar That Works
blog.post8Excerpt: Plan your content strategy effectively with our guide to creating and maintaining a content calendar.

blogPost.contentPlaceholder: This is where the full article content would be displayed. In a production environment, this content would be fetched from a CMS or database and rendered with proper formatting.
blogPost.takeaway1: AI-powered SEO tools are becoming essential for staying competitive
blogPost.takeaway2: Automation handles repetitive tasks while humans focus on strategy
blogPost.takeaway3: Data-driven decisions lead to better outcomes
blogPost.takeaway4: Continuous optimization is key to long-term success
blogPost.conclusion: The future of SEO is here, and it's powered by AI. By embracing these new tools and technologies, businesses can achieve better results with less manual effort.
